data.event: According to historical records, collection and production of sea salt in the region began as early as 119 BC during the Western Han Dynasty, when the settlement on the current location of Yancheng was named Yandu County (鹽瀆縣).

event.title: made of Tinghu and Yandu Districts, was home to 1,615,717 inhabitants in 2010

data.event: Its built up area made of Tinghu and Yandu Districts, was home to 1,615,717 inhabitants in 2010.
The population information here presented uses 2010 census data of permanent residents.
